body.name: MCQ Home Office Executive Task Adjustable Computer Desk Lumbar Support, Padded Armrest, Swivel Rolling, Wheels, Comfy Cushion Seat for Work, Study, Mid Back Chair, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 2 mins
features: ✔️PREMIUM MATERIAL - This mid-back office chair is designed with high-quality bonded leather with good toughness and non-tear properties, making it very comfortable to sit like sitting on soft cotton. In addition, the material has good air permeability, which makes it not sultry for a long time, and keeps you cool all day long.

✔️ERGONOMIC OFFICE CHAIR - The back of this executive office task chair adopts the "S" shape design, which conforms to the natural habit of the human body and can provide just the right support for the spine of the waist, reducing the pressure on the back and helping You maintain correct posture during long hours of work, which allows you to relax your body better.

✔️MULTIFUNCTION ADJUSTABLE - This height-adjustable office chair, the adjustable cushion height is 18.3inch - 22.1inch, 4.2inch range for you to choose from. In addition, the computer desk office chair also has a rocking model, just pull out the handle to adjust the backrest (90°-120°), this model allows your lumbar spine to find a better reclining angle, thereby reducing Injury to the spine.

✔️STURDY BASE - The base of this office chair adopts a sturdy and durable five-pointed star structure, as well as an upgraded 3-stage air spring air pump, which can be smoothly lifted and lowered, and the maximum supporting weight is up to 270 pounds, which can ensure your safety. And the chair has 360° rotatable casters, which can help you improve efficiency, and the high-quality material is suitable for any flooring material.

✔️EASY ASSEMBLY - This office chair has a minimalist design and compact structure, which can save you space. At the same time, the task of assembling the computer office chair is also very simple, and all the boxes contain the necessary tools for installation, as well as instructions. NOTE: If the surface of the chair is dirty, clean it easily with a damp cloth or car cleaner, this will make the chair last longer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, clean design, no more neck pain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm enjoying my new chair. The written instructions were very clear, and the instructional video was awesome. I also like that it came with extra screws! So far the chair is very comfortable, and I am enjoying sitting in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the chair is what ive been looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I picked my old desk chair out of the trash, and have had it for about 5 years up until now, and i was looking at this chair. I found that just like the comments said, that the chair was super easy to assemble, but did take heed of the comments that found the degradation of the chair as a caution given the price of said chair. what I'd like to say is that its structure and support is what I was lacking and what drove me to get a new chair, I do not spend all day in one, but I do spend a considerable amount of time, so I wanted something that I knew would last me a decent amount of time. for those who only have so munch money so spend on something like this, then I'd this is worth the money and time you take to assemble it. for better or worse that is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far am very happy with the chair. Was fairly easy to assemble and seems to be a good, solid chair. Was needing a better, more comfortable chair now that I am working from home and this one seems to have been a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price I paid I feel this is a really good office chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More support than needed
reviews.reviewText: This was an easy chair to put together. I know it has a weight limit BUT I weigh 330 and it holds me just fine! I also have really wide hips and it's not digging into my hips so if you have extra weight or wide hips this chair will work out great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars takes some breaking in
reviews.reviewText: this is a tad difficult to review. there are some things that i like about the chair, and some things that i don't. first off the installation was fairly easy. standard, if you've ever put an office chair together before.the material of the chair seems decent enough. it's easy to clean up if your kid happens to spill their juice all over it...i also like that the back of the chair is adjustable. and it stays where you adjust it to. my old chair you could lean back in it, but you had to physically keep it pushed back the whole time. i like that i can angle this back to where i need it at any given time. it easily adjusts up and down with the lever on the right hand side.now to comfort. it takes some getting used to. at first i'll say honestly i hated sitting in this chair. and i was about to toss it on the road for free. it takes a loooooong time to break this chair in to where it's comfortable. first off the sides of the seat hit your thighs weird. unless of course you are the size of a stick, and then i'm sure this would be fine right out of the box. but for those of us who have a bit of junk in our trunks, it can be rather uncomfortable to sit in, until you break the chair in enough. the headrest on the back of the chair to me is useless. i'm apparently too short to be able to use it properly. and i hate the lumbar support pillow that comes with this as well. it does nothing, except make me sit weird and be even more uncomfortable. i'm really glad that it is removeable.overall, this chair is decent. i'm not sure i'd ever pay this price again for this chair. but for the most part i'm starting to not hate it like i did when i first got it. so if you are taller than 5'4", and not overly chubby, and you have the patience to break in this chair, go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and well worth the price at the time. I enjoy sitting in this chair. It works for my back comfort and I can sit for long hours and not be uncomfortable.
